pr_title: don't bind to an address if the rest api is disabled.

timeline.message:
dont bind to an address if the rest api is disabled.

 - when the rest api is not enabled (rest-api-enabled=false), then i expect that no connection is possible on the specified port.

 fixes #2212

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

spotless.

 - fixed extractApiSpec task, as it wasn't enabling rest-api

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: Can we avoid creating BeaconRestApi entirely if it's disabled?
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: i'll see how ugly it gets, I was trying to minimise the change but maybe.
